Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.apache.ivy.Ivy.DATE_FORMAT
    Use the DateUtil utility class instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.ivy.core.module.descriptor.DefaultModuleDescriptor.addExtraInfo(String, String)
    org.apache.ivy.plugins.parser.m2.PomModuleDescriptorBuilder.addExtraInfos(Map)
    org.apache.ivy.plugins.parser.m2.PomModuleDescriptorBuilder.extractPomProperties(Map)
    org.apache.ivy.ant.IvyPublish.getDeliverivypattern()
    use IvyPublish.getSrcivypattern() instead.
    org.apache.ivy.core.module.descriptor.DefaultModuleDescriptor.getExtraInfo()
    org.apache.ivy.core.module.descriptor.ModuleDescriptor.getExtraInfo()
    this method is not returning the full content of the extra info: to get the full structure of the extra infos, use getExtraInfos()
    org.apache.ivy.ant.IvyBuildList.isSkipbuildwithoutivy()
    use IvyBuildList.getOnMissingDescriptor() instead.
    org.apache.ivy.core.retrieve.RetrieveEngine.retrieve(ModuleRevisionId, String, RetrieveOptions)
    Use RetrieveEngine.retrieve(org.apache.ivy.core.module.id.ModuleRevisionId, RetrieveOptions) instead
    org.apache.ivy.ant.IvyPublish.setDeliverivypattern(String)
    use IvyPublish.setSrcivypattern(String) instead.
    org.apache.ivy.ant.IvyResolve.setFailurePropery(String)
    Use IvyResolve.setFailureProperty(String) instead
    org.apache.ivy.ant.IvyCachePath.setId(String)
    use setPathid instead
    org.apache.ivy.ant.IvyBuildList.setSkipbuildwithoutivy(boolean)
    use IvyBuildList.setOnMissingDescriptor(String) instead.
